nodes.text: Kendruh was a male Human member of the Rishi-based Nova Blades pirate gang during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. An overseer for the slaves mining exonium, he kept records of the slaves' families to punish them in case the slaves rebelled and escaped. In 3637 BBY an individual incited a rebellion among the slaves kept by Nova Blades on a remote island and killed Kendruh to persuade the slaves join the rebellion in full force.

Slavemaster Kendruh appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released in 2014, to the 2011 BioWare massively multiplayer online role-playing video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
